article_title: The Rubio/Cruz Foreign Policy Debate Keeps Getting Worse
article_text:
Remember when Ted Cruz issued a little over-the-top bluster about nuking the Islamic State? "I don't know if sand can glow in the dark," he said last month, "but we're going to find out." Yesterday Marco Rubio responded:

Marco Rubio, ladies and gentlemen. A man who reacts to loose talk about a nuclear war by complaining that the would-be bomber won't put his money where his mouth is.

og.description: When Cruz cracks that we'll find out "if sand can glow in the dark," Rubio responds with...this?
og.title: The Rubio/Cruz Foreign Policy Debate Keeps Getting Worse

"I don't know if sand can glow in the dark," he said last month, "but we're going to find out."
Remember when Ted Cruz issued a little over-the-top bluster about nuking the Islamic State?
